content.question: Which of the following changes will increase the demand for bicycles?

choices.label: An increase in the price of bicycle helmets, a complementary good
An increase in the price of scooters, a substitute good
A decrease in the price of bicycles
A decrease in the number of buyers

content.answer: An increase in the price of scooters, a substitute good

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Using economic concepts, principles, or models, explain how a specific economic outcome occurs, or what action should be taken in order to achieve a specific economic outcome.
